title: Mark Blyth - Impact Interviews [Audio]
itunes:author: Joel Suss, Mark Blyth
description: Contributor(s): Joel Suss, Mark Blyth | Joel Suss, Managing Editor of our sister blog, LSE British Politics and Policy, spoke to Mark Blyth, Professor of Political Science at Brown University and author of Austerity: The History of a Dangerous Idea about what social scientists and humanities academics can do to improve the accessibility and impact of their work. Presented by Sierra Williams. Produced by Cheryl Brumley. Contributors: Joel Suss, Mark Blyth. Music and sound came courtesy of the following user at the Free Music Archive: Tozo (Halluzination).
